layman_description: Armor-piercing magnum ammunition for breaking through protection.
technical_description: Anti-armor revolver cartridge with penetration properties for protected targets.
player_impact: Penetrates armor on other players and heavily-protected zombie variants.

layman_description: A large double-width open desk safe with security enabled.
technical_description: Extended desk container with double-width frame and lock mechanism.
player_impact: A bigger desk safe lets you store more loot in your office-style base.

layman_description: A skill book teaching you to recover arrows more efficiently from corpses.
technical_description: Progression item granting experience multiplier for arrow harvesting from defeated enemies.
player_impact: After reading this, you recover more arrows when you loot dead zombies.

layman_description: A large double-wide gun safe with security locks installed.
technical_description: Extended weapon container with double-width model and lock state engaged.
player_impact: Store a lot of firearms and ammo in this large locked gun safe.

layman_description: A skill book for shooting at zombie legs to slow them down.
technical_description: Progression book providing ranged weapon skill unlock for limb-targeting mechanics.
player_impact: Learn to fire at zombie legs to slow their advance while protecting yourself.

layman_description: A double-wide wall safe without locks for spacious storage.
technical_description: Extended wall-mounted container with double-width frame and unsecured state.
player_impact: Mount a large safe on your wall for plenty of unprotected storage.

layman_description: A melee weapon mod that gives digging and harvesting powers.
technical_description: Weapon attachment adding tool functionality to melee weapons for block harvesting.
player_impact: Attach this to an axe to harvest blocks faster while still having a weapon.

layman_description: A large double-width desk safe without locks in player bases.
technical_description: Extended desk container with double-width dimensions and unlocked state.
player_impact: A big unsecured desk safe for office-themed base storage areas.

layman_description: A mod adding jagged teeth to melee blades for more damage.
technical_description: Weapon modification increasing sharp damage and trauma effects on blade weapons.
player_impact: Zombies bleed more when hit by serrated weapons, causing damage over time.

layman_description: A large brown double-width gun safe with security locks.
technical_description: Extended weapon container with brown finish and double-width locked state.
player_impact: A big secure brown gun safe for your weapon collection in the base.

layman_description: A mod that sets clubs on fire for burning damage.
technical_description: Weapon modification adding heat damage properties to club-type melee weapons.
player_impact: Swing this burning club and zombies catch fire from the impact.

layman_description: A triple-wide open wall safe for maximum storage display.
technical_description: Extended wall-mounted container with triple-width model and open state rendering.
player_impact: Show off all your valuable items in this massive open wall safe.

layman_description: A mod wrapping clubs with barbed wire for bleeding wounds.
technical_description: Weapon attachment adding barbed surface modifier increasing bleeding damage on melee strikes.
player_impact: Wrapped weapons cause zombies to bleed and lose health after being hit.

layman_description: A triple-width open desk safe for spacious office storage.
technical_description: Extended desk container with triple-width frame and open state.
player_impact: A huge open desk safe for organizing your office base storage.

layman_description: A mod adding metal spikes to club heads for extra piercing damage.
technical_description: Weapon modification with increased armor penetration and puncture damage properties.
player_impact: Spiked clubs penetrate armor better and deal extra damage to protected targets.

layman_description: A triple-width gun safe without locks for huge weapon storage.
technical_description: Extended weapon container with triple-width dimensions and unsecured state.
player_impact: Store an enormous collection of guns and ammo in this massive safe.

layman_description: A mod adding swinging metal chains to club weapons.
technical_description: Weapon modification extending melee reach and adding projectile swing mechanics.
player_impact: The chain extends your reach and can hit enemies further away.

layman_description: A triple-wide wall safe with no locks for base storage.
technical_description: Extended wall-mounted container with triple-width frame and unlocked state.
player_impact: Mount this huge open safe on your wall to store lots of items.

layman_description: A mod that electrifies club strikes to stun zombies.
technical_description: Weapon attachment adding electrical damage and stun effect to melee impacts.
player_impact: Tazer mods temporarily disable zombies when you hit them with the club.

layman_description: A triple-width desk safe without locks for large storage areas.
technical_description: Extended desk container with triple-width model and unsecured access.
player_impact: A massive open desk safe for sprawling office-style base storage.
